name: part_001
file: tmp_Yozora Mel stream (Oct 31, 2022)【ホロライブ ⧸ 3DLIVE】ハロウィンのお姫様  Halloween Princess 【#夜空メル爆誕2022】 [WbNkG3kbOHo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Yozora Mel performs her original song 'Kabocha wa Doko ni Ita' (Where Was the Pumpkin?).
Instrumental dance section leading into the next song.
Performance of the Japanese version of 'Myth or Treat' with guests Calliope Mori, Choco Yuzuki, Kureiji Ollie, and IRyS.
MC section where Mel and her guests discuss the performance and celebrate her birthday.

subtitles.original: ...妄想も七度目...
subtitles.english: ...delusions for the seventh time...

subtitles.original: だって私がね
subtitles.english: Because I'm, you know,

subtitles.original: ジャック・オー・ランタンたりとも怖がらないで
subtitles.english: not even afraid of Jack-o'-lanterns,

subtitles.original: 私、可愛そうでしょう？
subtitles.english: don't I look so pitifully cute?

subtitles.original: お願い kiss give me 全て与え続けて
subtitles.english: Please, kiss give me, keep giving me everything,

subtitles.original: 何もかも許される
subtitles.english: everything will be forgiven.

subtitles.original: やっぱ私が一番可愛いんだから
subtitles.english: After all, I'm the cutest one of all!

subtitles.original: Myth or Treat
subtitles.english: Myth or Treat

subtitles.original:
作詞：Calliope Mori　作曲：Farhan Sarasin
和訳：datenkou & 夜空メル
subtitles.english:
Lyrics: Calliope Mori  Composition: Farhan Sarasin
JP Translation: datenkou & Yozora Mel

subtitles.original: Trick or treat
subtitles.english: Trick or treat

subtitles.original: キミの推しはクローゼットの中でドッキリを仕掛けた
subtitles.english: Your oshi has set up a prank inside the closet.

subtitles.original: TRICK OR TREAT ほら もうキャンディーはない
subtitles.english: TRICK OR TREAT! Look, the candy is all gone.

subtitles.original: お腹がいっぱい？じゃあ、チェーンソーの出番かな？
subtitles.english: Is your stomach full? Then maybe it's the chainsaw's turn?

subtitles.original: みんなが取り憑かれた その仮説を確かめよう 解剖しよう
subtitles.english: Everyone's possessed! Let's check that hypothesis and dissect it.

subtitles.original: 踊れ、隠れないで泣き虫
subtitles.english: Dance! Don't hide away, you crybaby.

subtitles.original: 幻影のない HALLOWEEN は面白くない Haha
subtitles.english: HALLOWEEN without illusions is no fun! Haha!

subtitles.original: みんなが照れている
subtitles.english: Everyone is shyly blushing.

subtitles.original: かわいい
subtitles.english: How cute.

subtitles.original: 熱くなった血をくれるでしょう？
subtitles.english: You'll give me your feverish blood, won't you?

subtitles.original: Myth or Treat
subtitles.english: Myth or Treat

subtitles.original: あぁ、呪いの配信
subtitles.english: Ah, a cursed stream.

subtitles.original: びびって叫んじゃえ！
subtitles.english: Get scared and scream it out!

subtitles.original: 見せるよ今夜だけ まだ見ぬ恐ろしい顔を
subtitles.english: I'll show you, just for tonight, a terrifying face you've never seen.

subtitles.original: なんてガチ恋 NIGHT
subtitles.english: What a serious-love NIGHT!

subtitles.original: 魔女たちの出番だ
subtitles.english: It's time for the witches to shine!

subtitles.original: もう逃げられないよ 捧げてキミの魂を
subtitles.english: You can't escape anymore! Surrender your soul to us.

subtitles.original: 踊りだせ TONIGHT
subtitles.english: Start dancing TONIGHT!

subtitles.original: 見て恐ろしい SIGHT
subtitles.english: Behold the terrifying SIGHT!

subtitles.original: 腹ペコだ、食べたいねぇ、ちょうだい？
subtitles.english: I'm starving, I want to eat, can I have some?

subtitles.original: 曲でビビらせて 一緒に歌おう
subtitles.english: Let the song scare you, and let's sing together!

subtitles.original: 「嫁」じゃなくて かぼちゃよ DING-DONG?
subtitles.english: Not a 'wife', but a pumpkin! DING-DONG?

subtitles.original: 墓場で待ってる
subtitles.english: I'll be waiting in the graveyard.

subtitles.original: 覚悟できてる？
subtitles.english: Are you prepared?

subtitles.original: 我らの歌で盛り上がるがいい！ベー！ふふっ
subtitles.english: Get hyped up with our song! Bleh! Hehe.

subtitles.original: おびえて叫べ！ MYTH が暴れる これぞ我らのスタイル
subtitles.english: Be terrified and scream! MYTH is running wild! This is our style!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay! Yay!

subtitles.original: やったー、楽しかったー！
subtitles.english: I did it! That was so much fun!

subtitles.original: すごかった！いい曲だったね！最高！
subtitles.english: That was amazing! It's a great song! The best!

subtitles.original: 本当にまさかこの曲歌えるのめっちゃ嬉しい！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy we could actually sing this song!

subtitles.original: あぁ、早く私も3Dで踊りたいよ！
subtitles.english: Ah, I want to dance in 3D soon too!

subtitles.original: 見たい！ホロライブインドネシアの3D早く見たい！
subtitles.english: I want to see it! I want to see Hololive Indonesia's 3D soon!

subtitles.original: いつになれるの？
subtitles.english: When will it be ready?

subtitles.original: 分かんない！
subtitles.english: I don't know!

subtitles.original: 分かんないけど楽しみにしてて！
subtitles.english: I don't know, but please look forward to it!

subtitles.original: でもなんか今日 2D だけどさ、いい感じに後ろに...ね？
subtitles.english: But even though you're in 2D today, you're in the back in a good way... right?

subtitles.original: 確かに！画面がすごい！
subtitles.english: True! The screen is amazing!

subtitles.original: デカい！
subtitles.english: It's huge!

subtitles.original: デカいね私たち。巨人！
subtitles.english: We're huge. Like giants!

subtitles.original: おぉ、すごい！
subtitles.english: Oh, wow!

subtitles.original: この「Myth or Treat」は元々 EN のみんなで英語で歌った曲だったんだけど...
subtitles.english: This 'Myth or Treat' was originally a song that everyone in EN sang in English...

subtitles.original: 日本語でまさか歌えるなんて思ってなかったです。嬉しい。
subtitles.english: I never thought we'd be singing it in Japanese. I'm so happy.

subtitles.original: う、メルもこの曲さ、聞いた時からめっちゃ大好きな曲だったから嬉しいよ。
subtitles.english: Mel too, I've loved this song ever since I first heard it, so I'm happy.

subtitles.original: 日本語版すごい自然に聞こえて、すごく歌いやすかった。すごかった。
subtitles.english: The Japanese version sounds so natural and was very easy to sing. It was amazing.

subtitles.original: だよね！結構自分でね、「これやったら可愛いかな？」っていう風にちょっと直してみた。
subtitles.english: Right! I actually revised it a bit myself, thinking "would this be cute?"

subtitles.original: おぉ、すごい！自分で！？
subtitles.english: Oh, amazing! By yourself!?

subtitles.original: すごい！メル様のこの誕生日に歌うっていうのもなかなかじゃないですか？
subtitles.english: Amazing! Singing it on Mel-sama's birthday is quite something, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 嬉しい！やっぱハロウィンだからさ、ぴったりだよね、この曲ね。
subtitles.english: I'm so happy! Since it's Halloween, this song is perfect, right?

subtitles.original: メル様、お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Mel-sama, Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！やったー！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much! Yay!

subtitles.original: Happy Birthday!
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: この後も色々あるんじゃないですか？
subtitles.english: There's more to come after this, right?

subtitles.original: そうなんだよ、まだ二曲目だからさ...
subtitles.english: That's right, it's only the second song...
